summary: Made followers out of my friends and I for when we play, though free for anyone to use.
descriptionHtml:
4 Nords had been friends since childhood. Eventually they went on their own paths of life. Bedrel joined the Mages College, Andrel and Thetric became Mercenaries, and Fenrir had become a hunter. All their paths brought them back together, and now, it seems a 5th person is joining their group, the Dragonborn.

Classes as follows:
Andrel: 2H Warrior
Bedrel: Destruction Mage
Fenrir: Ranger
Thetric: 1H Warrior

Location:
You will find them in Dragonsreach, hopefully standing together as if they are talking.

If you find bugs with them, let me know please.

Changelog:
Version 1.0:
Added followers to Dragonsreach

Version 1.1:
Fixed Grey Face Glitch

Version 1.2:
Updated all for followers Classes.
Changed Bedrels voice to a non-accented one (I didn\'t think it fit with the others).

Version 1.3:
Changed Andrels and Thetrics voices so Andrel is not always talking about the Orc Strongholds or being an Orc, and Thetric so he isn\'t the same as Andrel.
Lowered Fenrirs One Handed stat so he is better with a bow.
Overall lowering of Perks so all followers don\'t just One Shot everything.
Fixed Bedrels War Paint.
author: Boryenko
